actions.text: Amendment SA 4867 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

Amendment SA 4867 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Byrd. (consideration: CR S8713-8714) To provide that, of the amount appropriated or otherwise made available by title II for the Army National Guard for operation and maintenance, up to $7,500,000 may be available to renovate and repair existing barracks at Camp Perry, Port Clinton, Ohio.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4867 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4867 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Byrd.

purpose: To provide that, of the amount appropriated or otherwise made available by title II for the Army National Guard for operation and maintenance, up to $7,500,000 may be available to renovate and repair existing barracks at Camp Perry, Port Clinton, Ohio.
